The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Dagannoth mother
This article is about the dagannoth boss found during Horror from the Deep or in the Nightmare Zone. For other uses, see Dagannoth (disambiguation).

The Dagannoth mother is fought at the end of the quest Horror from the Deep. She cycles through different colours to explicitly show her weaknesses.

While fighting the Dagannoth Mother, it is possible to hide or safespot behind the nearby stalagmites. Protect from Missiles is advised as her Ranged attack is highly accurate. She can hit up to 9s with Melee, and can hit double 12s with Ranged. Pures are advised to bring a ring of recoil and turn off auto-retaliate if not using melee. It should be noted that if she is killed by any source of recoil, the player will have to leave the area and repeat the fight (this may be a glitch). As a result, players should unequip their rings of recoil when she has low health.

Once she is defeated, you will obtain a rusty casket.

She can be fought in the Nightmare Zone after the quest is complete. Runes are provided in the arena.

Weakness by colour[edit | edit source]

Image Colour Weakness Attack Using
White Air spells Wind Strike, Bolt, Blast, Wave, or Surge.
Blue Water spells Water Strike, Bolt, Blast, Wave, or Surge.
Orange Melee Melee attacks.
Brown Earth spells Earth Strike, Bolt, Blast, Wave, or Surge.
Red Fire spells Fire Strike, Bolt, Blast, Wave, or Surge.
Green Ranged Ranged attacks.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
12 September 2013
(update)

The Dagannoth and Gelattinoth Mothers no longer notify you about their colour changes if you've left the Nightmare Zone arena.
